|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;HY27US08561A-TPCB; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS1G63EFR-Y5C; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8363SB; |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 84:1B:5E |oui = 84:1B:5E

|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Wistron NeWeb DNXA-G1 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9380;AR9380-AL1A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48DNXA07.0GB", "(XB114_030)", and "2011/04/13" is silkscreened :on the wireless modules in the FCC photos. This device is the dual channel, dual band version of the [[Netgear WNDAP620|WNDAP620]]. :Two (dual-band) DNXA-G1's would appear to be used. Per '''/proc/pci/devices''' output from a device, each uses :a 168c:0030 PCI ID (default for [[Atheros]] AR938x).
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/31855-netgear-adds-two-three-stream-n-business-aps ''NETGEAR Adds Two Three-Stream N Business APs'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
